com.team4001.lib.util

Class Gamepad

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.JoystickBase
        • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
          • com.team4001.lib.util.Gamepad

  • public class Gamepad
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
    Contains functions for use with the Logitech F310 controller. COURTESY OF TEAM 254
    Author:
    art.kalb96@gmail.com (Arthur Kalb), articgrayling8x8@gmail.com (Dorian Chan), kevinsundar@gmail.com (Kevin Vincent)
